response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our exclusive product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I am confident it will be a valuable asset to you. Considering its intrinsic worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an introductory price of $900,000. This is a special offer tailored to recognize your discerning taste and strategic vision. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 900000}
